original_text: You take big stones from the streams, and they become your idols. They are the gods that you love to worship. You pour drink offerings over them. You offer grain to them. Because of what you do, should I not punish you? You take big stones from the streams,
korean_text: 골짜기 가운데 매끄러운 돌들 중에 네 몫이 있으니 그것들이 곧 네가 제비 뽑아 얻은 것이라 또한 네가 전제와 예물을 그것들에게 드리니 내가 어찌 위로를 받겠느냐

sentences.original_text: You take big stones from the streams
They are the gods that you love to worship
You pour drink offerings over them
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들 위에 액체 제물을 붓습니다

sentences.original_text: You take big stones from the streams
